comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. Paul Drennan Cravath was Agnes Huntington (1862-1926), a former opera singer; and her daughter was Vera Agnes Huntington Cravath (1895-1985): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Drennan_Cravath books.google.com/books?id=34hmAAAAMAAJ&dq=%22Agnes%20... Vera married James Satterwhite Larkin in the summer of 1917, and she married William Francis Gibbs in 1927. Elsewhere: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6130627864/]

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Mrs. Cravath is holding a rosette, likely won by Vera or by her father, Paul D. Cravath. NYT of Sept 19, 1915 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10B1FFE3F551273... indicated that both were entered for the Mineola Horse Show -- so this may be the location. Also elsewhere:

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I wondered what she was holding!  Mothers are always stuck holding things. ;)

comment.author: 35075914@N06
comment._content: Thanks for the information!  We will update our record.
